DescriptionSucc: To promote economic growth, the government has granted Botnet a $1M subsidy.

DescriptionFail: Due to generally happy workers, there has been little to no wasted work time.
DescriptionSucc: Due to poor management and uninspired workers, $2M has been lost due to unprofitable time.

DescriptionFail: A low level manger has been caught embezzling from Botnet. Fortunately, Botnet manages to get the money back internally, and the media doesn't catch wind of it.
DescriptionSucc: A low level manger has been caught embezzling from Botnet. Word of this gets out, and Botnet looses $1M and 1 reputation.
Due to Botnet putting on charity events and staying involved in the community, Botnet gains 1 reputation.

TitleFail: Cyber Attack Prevented - Information is Safe
DescriptionFail: Due to the hard workers in the Cybersecurity division, a hacking attempt has been found and thwarted. Botnet publishes an article on how to prevent this type of attack and gains 1 reputation.
DescriptionSucc: Due to the underpaid and understaffed Cybersecurity division, a hostile body has taken an unknown amount of information. Botnet looses 3 reputation.

DescriptionFail: An anonymous employee report slandering Botnet for its poor working conditions was published by a popular news organization. Botnet looses 2 reputation.
DescriptionSucc: An anonymous employee report praising Botnet for its great working conditions and positive culture was published by a popular news organization. Botnet gains 1 reputation.

TitleFail: Cyber Attack Prevented - Mechs are Safe
DescriptionFail: Botnet's Cybersecurity team was able to catch a malicious bug from an unknown source before it could do any damage to Botnet's mechs.
DescriptionSucc: A malicious bug from an unknown source slipped through Cybersecurity's defense and affected many of Botnet's mechs. The compromised mechs had to be recalled and replaced. Botnet looses $5M and 1 Reputation.

DescriptionFail: President Nabdir, a world renowned peaceful leader, has accepted an invitation to Botnet's headquarters. A press release is held and he endorses Botnet for all the good it is doing in the world. Botnet gains 2 reputation.
DescriptionSucc: President Nabdir, a world renowned peaceful leader, has rejected an invitation to Botnet's headquarters. He sent a response saying that he would not endorse a company that has caused so much harm to the world. Botnet loses 1 reputation.
Besides the other events this quarter, it has been a fairly quiet quarter. Sometimes no news is good news.
